project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project is designed to: (i) expand, diversify and upgrade the training of technicians and skilled and semi-skilled workers; (ii) introduce comprehensive lower and upper secondary schooling, on a pilot basis; (iii) increase and upgrade the training of primary school teachers, technical teachers and workshop instructors; and (iv) improve educational and manpower planning.
